# Handout 8: Confidence interval for proportion supporting gay marriage

```{r} 
table(politics$gaymarriage)
#sum up to get n
1543+1989+2382
#estimate p-hat
round(2382/5914,2)
#t-stat
qt(0.975, 5914-1)
```

\Large

$$\texttt{standard error} = \sqrt{\hat{p}*(1-\hat{p})/n} = $$

&nbsp;

$$\texttt{confidence interval} = \hat{p} \pm t * (\texttt{standard error}) = $$
